itunes:subtitle: Retired U.S. Army General Stanley McChrystal discusses the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan, why he endorsed Joe Biden over Donald Trump for the 2020 election, what China and Russia's role in Afghanistan will be going forward, the future of geopolitics i...
itunes:summary:
Retired U.S. Army General Stanley McChrystal discusses the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan, why he endorsed Joe Biden over Donald Trump for the 2020 election, what China and Russia's role in Afghanistan will be going forward, the future of geopolitics in the Middle East, and what it's like to have a Rolling Stone hit piece written about you.
